document_data.mainbody:
Shakkral Hunzrin was a young drow and a member of House Hunzrin in the late 15 century DR.
Shakkral was renowned for her skills in trading beyond Menzoberranzan and even on the surface.
In the , Shakkral accompanied the First Priestess of her House, Charri Hunzrin, to a meeting with a clan of spriggan followers of Malcanthet in Damara arranged by the Hunzrin trader Denderida.
